Um dos meus jogos favoritos de todos os tempos. Portal 2 sendo o primeiro. Jogo Ã© fÃ¡cil mas super divertido e a histÃ³ria Ã© boa. SÃ³... nÃ£o tenta os desafios... o de menos passos vai consumir sua vida inteira....

Short but sweet.
Another perfect game.

So I've just finished the main story of this game, and it was a blast. Even though it's 13 years old, it still holds up very well.

GAMEPLAY
Amazing gameplay. it seems not that special at first but when you get the ability to use 2 portals at once, it becomes great. The puzzles in this game are made amazingly well. I normally don't like puzzles that much, but the puzzles in this game are not puzzles you'll stare at forever without knowing what to do, while also not being too easy.

GRAPHICS
Pretty meh for 2021, but pretty good for 2007. It is definitely not ugly, but it looks like one of those indie games made by one person.

DIFFICULTY
The game is not that difficult. I wouldn't expect an 8 year old to solve these puzzles, but they aren't too hard.

STORY
The story in this game is pretty good on it's own, but I definitely recommend also getting Portal 2 (which I'm currently playing) because it goes WAY deeper on story that this game set up.

PLAYTIME
This is one of the biggest drawbacks. The game is very short. As you can see at the top of the review, I finished this game in a few hours. There are some advanced stages I haven't done yet, but I've already finished the main story.


Overall, I definitely recommend this game. Get it in a bundle together with Portal 2 because I can assure you that you will want that game too, and you get a 25% discount.
